arts.ttl: Aston Villa fans deliver their verdict on Marcus Rashford’s first start for the club in draw with Liverpool
arts.sum: Aston Villa held Premier League leaders to a 2-2 draw in Wednesday’s league encounter at Villa Park. Liverpool opened the scoring through Mohamed Salah’s 29th-minute...

arts.ttl: Amadou Onana breaks silence on injury as he reveals when he will return for Aston Villa
arts.sum: Amadou Onana breaks silence on injury as he reveals when he will return for Aston Villa Amadou Onana has given an update on his return from injury for Aston Villa .

arts.ttl: Unai Emery issues Aston Villa refusal as Boubacar Kamara point raised after 2-2 draw with Liverpool
arts.sum: Unai Emery insists he will never punish his players for their mistakes after Andres Garcia made an error which led to Liverpool's opening goal in tonight's 2-2 thriller at Villa Park. In his post-match press conference Emery was asked about Garcia's mistake, and said: "The same problem we were having two years ago and sometimes last year, but we are trying to analyse and get better.

arts.ttl: 'I'm not happy with the result!' - Slot rues missed chances against Villa
arts.sum: Arne Slot was critical of his side's wastefulness in front of goal as Liverpool drew 2-2 away to Aston Villa to extend their lead at the top of the Premier League table to eight points.

arts.ttl: Fewer points than Arsenal in 2025 - Liverpool's form continues to falter following Villa Park draw
arts.sum: Liverpool moved eight points clear at the top of the Premier League on Wednesday night but it certainly wasn’t a moment worth celebrating for Arne Slot of his team. In a hard-fought 2-2...

arts.ttl: Darwin Nunez Causes a Stir Online With Actions After Aston Villa 2-2 Liverpool
arts.sum: The Uruguayan's post-match action has been lambasted by Liverpool fans on social media.

arts.ttl: All Possible UEFA Champions League Round of 16 Games
arts.sum: Every possible Champions League tie for the round of 16 ahead of the draw on Feb. 21.

arts.ttl: Liverpool, Arsenal and Aston Villa's next Champions League opponents clearer after play-offs
arts.sum: The draw for the next round of the Champions League will take place on Friday and Arsenal, Aston Villa and Liverpool now know the two potential teams they could face

arts.ttl: John Townley's Villa player ratings as 8s and 7s awarded after Liverpool draw
arts.sum: Villa were behind for only nine minutes as Youri Tielemans restored parity after Liverpool failed to clear their lines from a set-piece, with John McGinn and Tyrone Mings keeping the attack alive. Villa went close to opening up a two-goal cushion early in the second period when Marcus Rashford beat Alisson to the ball on the left, but the winger’s effort on goal was cleared off the line by Ibrahima Konate.

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah stars again as Liverpool draw at Aston Villa
arts.sum: The Egyptian took his goal contributions to 39 in just 26 Premier League games, with 24 goals and 15 assists.
